label.phrase: it's not even my knee i can't even bend down to line up a putt because my thighs hurt so much

clusterList.phrase: it's not even my knee i can't even bend down to line up a putt because my thighs hurt so much
i'm questionable because my knee hurts
my hamstring was just a bit tight i don't know if it was after playing three games last week but i told the manager i didn't want to take any chances

my knee's been shaky for a while now it was nothing that was ever too much of a concern to let me play or anything like that but it's been like that for a while it wasn't too long after i got it initially fixed that it was like that
i never used the injury as an excuse

that's the way it goes it's football it's a physical game you're going to get beat up you're going to get hurt there's a difference between being injured and being hurt if you're injured you can't play if you're hurt you play through the pain and do what you have to do
i had a bit of a niggly injury to the groin a few weeks ago nothing serious brosque said
